caption.title: Case study 2— m.
caption.p:
Simulation results for epidemic pairs 3 (a)-(b) and 4 (c)-(d) in Table 4. Distribution of β
i values in the population ( left): the x-axis represents values of ln( β
i ), and the y-axis shows values of N
i . The red vertical line corresponds to the average susceptibility β. Time course of the epidemic ( right) in terms of variables S
i ( t) ( solid) for each sub-population, and I( t) ( dashed).
